data_table.description: CT Lung Measurements (Round 2), Offspring and Generation 3 Cohorts. These measurements were done on the second round of CT scans, where the scan was optimal for lung measurements. The CT scans were completed from 9/2008 to 3/2011.

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Unique study participant identification number

variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study cohort identifier

variable.name: convolutionKernel
variable.description: Reconstruction filter used to generate the images
variable.comment: Character variable Blank = Field not filled in. Non-blank = Field filled in.

variable.name: reconstructionDiameter
variable.description: Size of field of view

variable.name: LAA950
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -950 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LAA925
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -925 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LAA910
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -910 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LAA905
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -905 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LAA900
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -900 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LAA875
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -875 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LAA856
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is less than -856 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: HAA0
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is greater than 0 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: HAA600
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is greater than -600 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: HAA250
variable.description: Percent of the total lung that is greater than -250 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: MEAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Mean lung density of the total lung

variable.name: STD_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Standard deviation of the density of the total lung

variable.name: SKEWNESS
variable.description: Skewness of the total lung density distribution

variable.name: KURTOSIS
variable.description: Kurtosis of the total lung density distribution

variable.name: MEDIAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Median lung density of the total lung

variable.name: UT_LAA950
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -950 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_LAA925
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -925 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_LAA910
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -910 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_LAA905
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -905 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_LAA900
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -900 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_LAA875
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -875 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_LAA856
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is less than -856 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_HAA0
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is greater than 0 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_HAA600
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is greater than -600 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_HAA250
variable.description: Percent of the upper third of the lung that is greater than -250 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: UT_MEAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Mean lung density of the upper third of the lung

variable.name: UT_STD_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Standard deviation of the lung density of the upper third of the lung

variable.name: UT_SKEWNESS
variable.description: Skewness of the upper third of the lung density distribution

variable.name: UT_KURTOSIS
variable.description: Kurtosis of the upper third of the lung density distribution

variable.name: UT_MEDIAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Median lung density of the upper third of the lung density

variable.name: MT_LAA950
variable.description: Percent of the middle third of the lung that is less than -950 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: MT_LAA925
variable.description: Percent of the middle third of the lung that is less than -925 Hounsfield Units

variable.description: Percent of the middle third of the lung that is greater than -600 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: MT_HAA250
variable.description: Percent of the middle third of the lung that is greater than -250 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: MT_MEAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Mean lung density of the middle third of the lung

variable.name: MT_STD_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Standard deviation of the lung density of the middle third of the lung

variable.name: MT_SKEWNESS
variable.description: Skewness of the middle third of the lung density distribution

variable.description: Kurtosis of the middle third of the lung density distribution

variable.description: Median lung density of the middle third of the lung

variable.name: LT_LAA950
variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is less than -950 Hounsfield Units

variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is less than -905 Hounsfield Units

variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is less than -900 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LT_LAA875
variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is less than -875 Hounsfield Units

variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is greater than 0 Hounsfield Units

variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is greater than -600 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LT_HAA250
variable.description: Percent of the lower third of the lung that is greater than -250 Hounsfield Units

variable.name: LT_MEAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Mean lung density of the lower third of the lung

variable.name: LT_STD_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Standard deviation of the lung density of the lower third of the lung

variable.name: LT_SKEWNESS
variable.description: Skewness of the lower third of the lung density distribution

variable.description: Kurtosis of the lower third of the lung density distribution

variable.name: LT_MEDIAN_LUNG_DENSITY
variable.description: Median lung density of the lower third of the lung

variable.name: volume
variable.description: Volume of the total lung

variable.name: mass
variable.description: Mass of the total lung

variable.name: ut_volume
variable.description: Volume of the upper third of the lung

variable.name: ut_mass
variable.description: Mass of the upper third of the lung

variable.name: mt_volume
variable.description: Volume of the middle third of the lung

variable.name: mt_mass
variable.description: Mass of the middle third of the lung

variable.name: lt_volume
variable.description: Volume of the lower third of the lung

variable.name: lt_mass
variable.description: Mass of the lower third of the lung

variable.name: ctdate
variable.description: Date of CT scan
variable.comment: CTDATE has an MMDDYYYY format, however only the month and year are displayed here. For SHARe - CTDATE is number of days since exam 1, do not format as a date.
